benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

benefits.name: All-Around Adept
effects: You gain proficiency in all skills.

benefits.name: Expertise
effects: Choose one skill in which you lack Expertise. You gain Expertise in that skill.
